ingredients: 4½ cups cooked long grain white rice, cooled to room temp (or leftover rice)
2 TB Asian sesame oil (brown in color, highly aromatic, found in Asian aisles)
½ tsp table salt, plus more to taste
½ tsp white pepper, plus more to taste
½ cup frozen peas/carrots, defrosted at room temp
1½ cups cooked diced ham (Chinese sausage, shrimp, ground meat, or chicken all are good alternatives)
2 large eggs, lightly beaten with ⅛ tsp salt, finely scrambled
